Maciejonos/qbitwebui

Web interface for managing multiple torrent instances

View on index

Related repos

  • search plugins for qbittorrent, community maintained
  • web UI for managing and monitoring multiple torrent clients
  • Qbittorrent API with Debrid support for managing torrents and media automation
  • Manage multiple qBittorrent instances
  • Torrent client as a filesystem
  • Flutter app for remote qBittorrent management
  • proxy for torrent indexers, connects apps like Sonarr and Radarr
  • control qBittorrent from your phone or computer
  • self-host your own torrent streaming and direct download server with Docker
